name: TCG Companion
description:
TCG Companion is an app to help you keep a track of you card collection. View all sets released so far, with all cards including reverse holo tracking!

FEATURES
• View all English sets
• View Japanese sets
• View all cards for each set
• View breakdown of stats for each set
• Track collected cards
• Track reverse holo collection
• Create customised list of cards
• Dark mode support

If you have any feedback or want to see a new feature, email us at pokemon.collector.app@gmail.com
